parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Maintain the attributes for each uniquely identified individual, device, or service in {{ ia-4.9_prm_1 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: For each of the entities covered in IA-2, IA-3, IA-8, and IA-9, it is important to maintain the attributes for each authenticated entity on an ongoing basis in a central (protected) store.
